thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Recipharm Signs Licensing Agreement with Altus Formulation

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Recipharm Signs Licensing Agreement with Altus Formulation
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - RECIPHARM AB (PUBL):
* RECIPHARM AND ALTUS FORMULATION COLLABORATE TO OFFER NOVEL DRUG DELIVERY TECHNOLOGIES FOR VALUE ADDED MEDICINES
* ‍HAS SIGNED A LICENSING AGREEMENT WITH ALTUS FORMULATION INC​
* ‍SIGNED A LICENSING AGREEMENT WITH ALTUS FORMULATION INC.​
* ‍ WILL CO-DEVELOP NEW VALUE ADDED MEDICINES FOR ITS CUSTOMERS UTILISING ALTUS’ PATENTED INTELLITAB™ AND FLEXITAB™ DRUG DELIVERY TECHNOLOGIES.​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
